games.recap_text: The Philadelphia Eagles dominated the Dallas Cowboys in a division matchup, securing a 28-23 victory. Philadelphia's offense controlled the tempo, with multiple scoring drives throughout the game. Dallas tried to rally late but fell just short of the comeback.

The Kansas City Chiefs remained undefeated with a thrilling 31-28 victory over the Buffalo Bills. In a back-and-forth battle, Kansas City's late-game execution proved decisive. This was an instant classic between two AFC East contenders.
